Blackwing

This deck is based off Jaden Yugi's deck in the final seasons of the GX series. I used Neo Space Connector as the DM so you can have Warrior, Elemental Hero, Neos, Neospacians, and light monsters all in one deck. The goal is to spam out some high quality fusion monsters and then take over the game. The DM allows you to easily get Neos out, or Grand Mole which is a hard Monster to battle.

Cyber Dragon is the Domain of Zane from GX, who is suppose to represent that Seasons Kaiba. The end goal of his deck is to pump out powerful fusion monsters. Cyber Dragon cards have unique ways of having the same name in Domain while on the field. So summoning Cyber End Dragon is easier than summoning Blue Eyes Ultmate Dragon in a Blue Eyes deck. The DM, Cyber Dragon Core can tutor a Spell/Trap in the cyber dragon domain which can easily get you Cyber EMergency, that gets you Cyber dragon. Easily leading you into Cyber twin Dragon.

Greens OTS tournement Fiends

Against Yubel decks, you generally destroy or banish their backrow first before dealing with their monsters. Diabellstar the Black Witch can beat over their small, unprotected Apollousa, Bow of the Goddess. Kurikara Divincarnate and Sinful Spoils of Subversion - Snake-Eye help break their monster-heavy boards and are searchable with Snake-Eye Ash and Snake-Eyes Poplar respectively.

deck_excerpt: It's a great deck for beginners!
deck_description:
Swordsoul is a powerful archetype whose core cards can be obtained by completing the Rookie and Returner Mutual Follower Campaign! Completing the campaign twice will give you two Sword of Souls Structure Decks plus Swordsoul Sinister Sovereign - Qixing Longyuan as a bonus; what a great start! Mastering this deck will teach you the basics of modern Yu-Gi-Oh!

Staples to craft

x1 Baronne de Fleur

This amazing monster can negate and destroy almost any card, destroy another card on the field for free, and shuffle herself back into the deck to revive a monster in your graveyard. She's very easy to summon with Swordsoul Strategist Longyuan + a Swordsoul token.

x3 Maxx "C"

A staple for nearly every deck, it gives you free draws whenever your opponent special summons!

x2 Ash Blossom & Joyous Spring

It's a blank check for most decks that could also negate Maxx C before it becomes a problem. You can buy 1 free Ash Blossom using gems at the shop and the rest can be crafted.

x2 Called by the Grave

This is a flexible card that not only negates hand traps like Ash Blossom and Maxx C, but also disrupts the opponent's graveyard strategies.

x1 Crossout Designator

This card is great for negating the effect of a card both you and your opponent are likely to have.

x3 Infinite Impermanence

Good when going first and second, this card can negate spell, trap, monster effects depending on whether it was set before activating. Be careful of the columns hit by Infinite Impermanence!

x1 Archnemeses Protos

This intimidating card is easy to summon, cannot be destroyed by a card effect, is searchable with Swordsoul Emergence, and has a devastating effect that destroys and restricts the attributes of monsters both players can special summon. It cannot destroy itself by its own effect, so you can use it to lock out dark monsters for free!

x2 Baxia, Brightness of the Yang Zing

It's another flexible card whose effects can be used multiple times in a turn. The first effect is great for dismantling boards. The second effect can destroy a card you control to revive a monster like Swordsoul of Taia or Incredible Ecclesia, the Virtuous from your graveyard to extend your plays.

x1 Yazi, Evil of the Yang Zing

It can clear boards like Baxia but through destruction. It can destroy itself and 1 card your opponent controls. If it is destroyed, then you can special summon a wyrm like Swordsoul of Mo Ye or Taia from the deck to extend your plays. You can synchro summon Yazi by changing your wyrm monster's level with Swordsoul Emergence's banish effect.

Optional Cards

Psychic End Punisher

It's nearly unstoppable when you're low on life points. Incredible Ecclesia + Tenyi Spirit - Vishuda or Tenyi Spirit - Ashuna or Ash Blossom & Joyous Spring + a level 8 synchro can summon it.

Chaofeng, Phantom of the Yang Zing

You can summon Chaofeng in an advanced combo involving Tenyi Spirit - Ashuna + Swordsoul of Taia + Vishuda or Tenyi Spirit - Adhara; more on this later. In short, it can create a combo line that prevents your opponent from activating the effects of light monsters like Nibiru, the Primal Being, Centur-Ion Primera, or Lo, the Prayers of the Voiceless Voice.

Ghost Ogre & Snow Rabbit

She is a general purpose hand trap that can destroy annoying cards like Nightmare Pain and S:P Little Knight. Triple Tactics Talent is a good alternative to this card.

Pot of Desires

It allows you to draw 2 cards and power up Swordsoul Supreme Sovereign - Chengying to new heights.

Draco Berserker of the Tenyi

He's a level 8 synchro wyrm that requires generic materials to summon and has great effects. He can be summoned under your Ashuna's and the opponent's Clockwork Night type locks!

The Nibiru-Resistant Chaofeng Combo Example

Requires Swordsoul of Taia + Tenyi Spirit - Ashuna + Tenyi Spirit - Adhara or Tenyi Spirit - Vishuda in your hand. This combo example will assume you have Vishuda in the hand, so Adhara would later be special summoned from the deck. You can use this combo to protect your Swordsoul plays from Nibiru, the Primal Being with minimal investment.

1. Activate Ashuna's effect to special summon itself from the hand.

2. Use Ashuna as link material for Monk of the Tenyi.

3. Activate Vishuda's effect to special summon itself from the hand.

4. Activate Ashuna's graveyard effect to special summon Adhara from the deck. This will lock you into special summoning only wyrms for the rest of the turn.

5. Synchro summon Baxia, Brightness of the Yang Zing by using Vishuda and Adhara as material. The opponent must Nibiru here or on step 6, or its effect won't activate.

6. Activate Baxia's effect to revive Adhara from the graveyard by destroying Monk of the Tenyi.

7. Synchro summon Chaofeng, Phantom of the Yang Zing by using Baxia and Adhara as material. Now the opponent can't activate light monster effects, and you can start your Swordsoul plays.

8. Normal summon Swordsoul of Taia.

9. Activate Taia's effect to summon a token by banishing Monk of the Tenyi from your graveyard.

10. Activate Adhara's graveyard effect to add Ashuna from the banish zone back to your hand.

11. Synchro summon Swordsoul Grandmaster - Chixiao by using Taia and the token as material.

12. Activate Chixiao's effect as chain link 1 and Taia's effect as chain link 2. You can send any wyrm to the graveyard and search for any Swordsoul card you'd like.

Any wyrm you send to the graveyard can be banished with Swordsoul of Taia and recycled with Tenyi Spirit - Adhara. If you search for Swordsoul Strategist Longyuan, then you can use the Tenyi Spirit - Ashuna in your hand as fodder. If you search for Swordsoul Emergence, then you can use it to search for Archnemeses Protos.
Honestly... I don't have much to say
